Uses of Class
com.microsoft.azure.datalake.store.ADLStoreOptions

  • Packages that use ADLStoreOptions 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.azure.datalake.store
    The main Azure Data Lake Store SDK classes.

    • Uses of ADLStoreOptions in com.microsoft.azure.datalake.store

      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.datalake.store that return ADLStoreOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ADLStoreOptions ADLStoreOptions.enableThrowingRemoteExceptions​()
      Throw server-returned exception name instead of ADLExcetption.
      ADLStoreOptions ADLStoreOptions.setDefaultTimeout​(int defaultTimeoutInMillis)
      sets the default timeout for calls make by methods in ADLStoreClient objects
      ADLStoreOptions ADLStoreOptions.setFilePathPrefix​(java.lang.String prefix)
      Set a prefix that will be prepended to all file paths from this client.
      ADLStoreOptions ADLStoreOptions.setInsecureTransport​()
      Use http as transport for back-end calls, instead of https.
      ADLStoreOptions ADLStoreOptions.setReadAheadQueueDepth​(int queueDepth)
      Sets the default Queue depth to be used for read-aheads in ADLFileInputStream.
      ADLStoreOptions ADLStoreOptions.setUserAgentSuffix​(java.lang.String userAgentSuffix)
      sets the user agent suffix to be added to the User-Agent header in all HTTP requests made to the server.
      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.datalake.store with parameters of type ADLStoreOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ADLStoreClient.setOptions​(ADLStoreOptions o)
      Sets the options to configure the behavior of this client.
